attributes.action: Install red light cameras on all sides of Radford Road/Valley Road jct in Nottm.
attributes.background: Since February 2018, there have been at least 3 major accidents (where at least one car has been a write off) on the junction as people have been crossing the lights after they’ve changed at an attempt to shorten their journey time.
